body:
Comment 6: 
Even if the android build uses nacl's fake fs, there still has to be some kind of adb
sync/push/etc step. It could share the .proto file if there was going to be more than
one, but otherwise it's probably not worth it.

It might be easier, if you're teaching go test about the fake fs, to add an adb sync
there that follows the same semantics (i.e. copy any testdata directory for the current
package).
